name: Cecil Smith and The Catacombs of RA
name_original: Cecil Smith and The Catacombs of RA
description:
Help Renowned adventurer and gentleman archaeologist Cecil Smith as he delves through the 6 levels of mysterious catacombs of RA in search of the missing ring of Amaron fuelled only by an unhealthy dependency on ancient mushrooms.

Made for the 7DRL challenge as a sequel to a previous Alakajam entry Cecil Smith and the Lost Treasures of King Tutti. This sequel adds procedurally generated levels and a few other features but reused some art and sound from that game.

Controls

Arrow Keys to Move or Move/Attack if moving into an Enemy.

A for Aim (useful for projectile weapons or attacking on diagonal)

Number Keys 0-9 to use/equip inventory slot items

Spacebar to wait a turn

M to view the map

D followed by inventory number to discard an item (it will be permanently destroyed)
